name: §6§l§nRune Slots
description: Engrave runes on your fur to strengthen yourself with the powers of the elders.

text.translate: Press [%s] to inspect your Rune Slots.

text.text: Key used is [Creative Mode - Save Hotbar Activator]

text.translate:
Use [%s] to trigger your Head Rune's active effect.
Use [%s] to trigger your Back Rune's active effect.
Hold [%s] when falling to use your Raven Rune's effect.

text.text: Keys used are [Origins - Primary, Secondary] And [Movement - Jump]

stack.tag: {display:{Name:'["",{"text":""}]'},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Spirit Jump Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"blue"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Grants the ability to Spirit Jump while in the air."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Aetlyena"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Fox Dash Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"aqua"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Grants the ability to Dash."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Yepi"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Ram Dash Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Grants the ability to Dash long distances with a long cooldown and high energy cost."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Eres"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Wolf Dash Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"gray"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Grants the ability to Dash short distances with a short cooldown."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Okama and Esmir"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Rune of Éona","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"dark_purple"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Gain 4 Extra Maximum Health Points."}]','[{"text":"Double the healing effect from all sources."}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Wisp Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"blue"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Grants the ability to become a wisp to scout surrounding area."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Aetlyena"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Spirit Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"aqua"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Grants the ability to become a Spirit Fox."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Yepi"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Storm Cloak Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Lightning restores Spirit Energy."}]','[{"text":"Reduced damage from lightning."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Eres"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Flame Cloak Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"gold"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Reduced fire damage and burn duration."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Okama and Esmir"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Bright Heart Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"red"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Immunity against negative potion effects."}]','[{"text":"Immunity against Magic Damage."}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Feather Fall Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"aqua"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Gain immunity against fall damage."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Yepi"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Thorn Walker Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"dark_green"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Use Spirit Energy to prevent pricking damage."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Oto-Oksu"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Spirit Sprint Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Double tap Sprint to Sprint even faster."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Eres"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Rune of the Drowned","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"aqua"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Sink instead of swim."}]','[{"text":"Able to breathe under water."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Okama and Esmir"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Lava Walker Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"dark_red"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Immune to damage from standing on scorching floor."}]','[{"text":"Immune to damage from Lava."}]','[{"text":"Able to walk on Lava."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Otamatak"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}
{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Water Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"dark_blue"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Swim much faster."}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Rune of Aetlyena","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"aqua"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Recover Spirit Energy faster."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Aetlyena"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Wisp Seeker Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"aqua"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Discover living beings near you when sneaking."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Yepi"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Rune of Suffering","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"dark_red"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Spirit Energy recovers rapidly when Health is critically low."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Oto-Oksu"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Moon Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"aqua"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Spirit Energy recovers faster at night."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Okama and Esmir"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Lore Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"dark_purple"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Able to remove Curse Enchantments in a Grindstone."}]','[{"text":"Gain 2x Experience."}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Glide Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"dark_purple"}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"Grants Glide ability."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Thought"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}

{display:{Name:'["",{"text":"Lift Glide Rune","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"light_purple"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Grants weaker Glide ability but glide upward with Speak."}]','[""]','[{"text":"Runes of Thought"}]']},delete_if_out:1,HideFlags:1}
